text.div:
ConformanceEventMode

The mode of a message conformance statement

This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/message-conformance-event-mode

CodeDisplayDefinition
senderThe application sends requests and receives responses.
receiverThe application receives requests and sends responses.

description.value: The mode of a message conformance statement

definition.value: The application sends requests and receives responses.
The application receives requests and sends responses.
